text: Chloroauric acid is an inorganic acid with the formula . Pure chloroauric acid is a yellow powder but it is usually seen dissolved in hydrochloric acid. == Preparation == Chloroauric acid can be made by reacting gold with aqua regia. == Safety == Chloroauric acid is corrosive and toxic and must be handled with caution. Gloves and a face shield should be worn when handling the acid. ==References== Category:Solvated proton acids Category:Chlorine compounds Category:Gold compounds
title: Chloroauric acid
